name: Other (e22my)
description:
[WASD] or [Arrow Keys] to Move

[Spacebar] to jump

[Spacebar] while in midair to enter [Fireball Sheet] mode, while in this state, you are invulnerable to enemies and you're able to destroy ghosts. Be careful, you'll become vulnerable again when you touch the ground.

Run and jump off slopes to perform a super jump.

The aim of each regular level is to get 10 000 points to get to the next level

Play the tutorial if you are unsure or want to play with the controls
